title: Bonds to Watch: An Update on the Fixed Income Market
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and associate editor Andrew Bary speak with Steve Boothe, a portfolio manager at T.Rowe Price, on the outlook for inflation and interest rates, and where to find value in today's fixed-income market.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
